comp-withdrawal-comparison-current-li-1: Wasu masu asusu na iya bayar da adireshin cire kuɗi a lokacin da suka fara saita adadin kuɗin–waɗannan masun asusu basu wani abu da suke bukatar yi
comp-withdrawal-comparison-current-li-2: Yawancin masu sa kuɗi ba su samar da adireshin cire kuɗi ba a lokacin saka kuɗi na farko, kuma za su buƙaci sabunta bayanan su na cire kuɗi. Launchpad yana da umarni kan yadda za a yi wannan
comp-withdrawal-comparison-current-p: Za ku iya shigar da lambar shaidar mai tantancewar ku a nan, dan ku gan ko akwai buƙatar sabunta takarkun shaidarku <Text as="span" fontWeight="normal">(za a iya samun wannan a cikin rajistan ayyukan ku):</Text>
comp-withdrawal-comparison-new-title: Sabbin masu sa kuɗi (waɗanda ba su yi ajiya ba)
comp-withdrawal-comparison-new-li-1: Ta hanyar asali, sabbin masu saka kuɗi da ke neman ba da damar biyan lada ta atomatik da ayyukan cirewa yakamata su samar da adireshin cirewa na Ethereum da suke sarrafawa lokacin samar da maɓallai masu tabbatarwa ta amfani da kayan aikin saka hannun jari na CLI
comp-withdrawal-comparison-new-li-2: Ba a buƙatar wannan a lokacin ajiyar kuɗi, amma zai hana a sabunta waɗannan makullin nan gaba dan buɗe kuɗinku
comp-withdrawal-comparison-new-p: Staking Launchpad zai jagorance ku ta hanyar sa kuɗi.
comp-withdrawal-credentials-error: Oops! sake duba lambar shaidar tsarin mai tantncewarku sai ku sake gwadawa.
comp-withdrawal-credentials-upgraded-1: Fihirisar mai tantancewa {{validatorIndex}} yana shirin da zai fara karɓar kyauta!
comp-withdrawal-credentials-upgraded-2: Takardun shaidar cire kuɗi da aka danganta da adireshin farawa:
comp-withdrawal-credentials-not-upgraded: Wannan mai tantancewar yana buƙatar haɓakawa.
Wannan Holesky na gwajin 'mai tabbatarwa' na buƙatar sabuntawa.
Ana iya samun umarni a kan yadda ake sabuntawa yanzu a Staking Launchpad
page-staking-image-alt: Hoton Rhino mascot domin staking launchpad.
page-staking-benefits-1-description: Ana ba da lada don ayyukan da ke taimakawa cimma hanyar sadarwa yarjejeniya. Za ku sami lada don gudanar da manhajar wanda ya na tsari ma’amaloli a cikin sabbin tubalai yadda ya kamata kuma ya bincika aikin sauran masu tabbatarwa saboda wannan shine abin da ke tsari aikin chain.
page-staking-benefits-2-description: Hanyar sadarwar ta zama mai karfi da hare-hare yayin da aka kara saka hannun jarin ETH, kamar yadda hakan ke bukatar karin ETH don sarrafa yawancin hanyar sadarwar. Don zama barazana, kuna bukatar rike mafi yawancin masu tantancewa, wanda ke nufin kuna bukatar sarrafa yawancin ETH a cikin tsarin—wannan yana da yawa!
page-staking-benefits-3-description: Masu saka hannun jari wato masu saka kuɗi ba sa buƙatar shigar da hujja-na-aiki don shiga cikin tsarewan hanyar sadarwar, ma’ana node na iya aiki akan na’ura mai karancin karfi ta amfani da karamin kuzari.
page-staking-benefits-3-link: Ƙarin bayani game da amfani da makamashin Ethereum
page-staking-description: Staking shine aikin saka ETH 32 don kunna software mai tantancewa. A matsayin mai tantancewa za ku kasance da alhakin adana bayanai, sarrafa ma'amaloli, da kara sabbin tubalan ga sarkar tubalan. Wannan zai kiyaye Ethereum amintacce ma kowa kuma ku sami sabon ETH a cikin tsari.
page-staking-hero-title: Yadda za ka sa ETH ɗinka
page-staking-hero-header: Samun kyautuka a yayin da kake tsare Ethereum
page-staking-hero-subtitle: Duk wani mai asusu da kowane adadin ETH zai iya taimakawa wajen tsare hanyar sadarwa da samun kyauta a lokacin aikin.
page-staking-more-on-solo: Ƙarin bayani akan solo staking na gida
page-staking-learn-more-solo: Ƙarin koyo game da solo staking
page-staking-more-on-saas: Ƙarin bayani kan sa kuɗ a matsayin aiki
page-staking-learn-more-saas: Nemi ƙarin ilimi kan sa kuɗi a matsayin aiki
page-staking-more-on-pools: Ƙarin bayani kan sa kuɗin haɗaka
page-staking-learn-more-pools: Ƙara koyo game da sa kuɗin haɗaka
page-staking-section-why-title: Mesa za ka saka ETH ɗinka?
page-staking-section-why-p1: Duk yana dogara ne akan adadin ETH ɗin da kake son yi adana da shi. Za ka buƙaci ETH guda 32 don kunna na'urar tabbatarwarka, amma yana yiwuwa ka yi staking da ƙananan adadi.
page-staking-section-why-p2: Duba zaɓuɓɓukan da ke ƙasa ka kuma zaɓi wanda ya fi dacewa da kai da kuma hanyar sadarwa.
page-staking-guide-title-rocket-pool: Masu gudanar da Rocket Pool Node
page-staking-hierarchy-saas-p1: Idan baka so ko baka jin daɗin mu'amala da hardware amma har yanzu kuna son zuba hannun jarin 32 ETH, zaɓuɓɓukan zuba hannun jari suna ba ku damar wakilta bangare mai wahala yayin da kuke samun ladan asali.
page-staking-hierarchy-saas-p2: Waɗannan zaɓuɓɓuka a galibi suna tafiya da ku ta hanyar ƙirƙirar saiti na takaddun shaida, loda mukullin budewa zuwa gare su, da ajiye 32 ETH ɗin ku. Wannan yana ba da damar aiki don ingantawa a madadin ku.
page-staking-hierarchy-saas-p3: Wannan nau'in jingina na ETH yana buƙatan ka amince da mai samar da jinginan. Dan kiyasta hassara da zai iya aukuwa a wannan kasuwancin, ajiyar mabuɗan sirri na cire ETH dinka tamkar a hannunka suke.
page-staking-hierarchy-pools-p2: Daga cikin jerin zaɓukan da kenan akwai abin da ake kira 'liquid staking' wanda ta wannan hanyar, mutane za su iya jinginar da ETH da suka mallaka kai tsaye. Jingina ta wannan hanyar yana buƙatar alamar shaida manuniya ta ERC-20 da zai nuna adadin ETH da mutum ya jinginar.
page-staking-hierarchy-pools-p4: Sa kuɗi haɗaka ba tare da asalin cibiyar sadarwar Ethereum. Wasu mutane daban suna gina hanyoyin magance su, kuma su zasu ɗauki asarar.
page-staking-hierarchy-cex-p1: Yawancin musayan tsakiya suna ba da ayyuka na sa kuɗi idan har ba ku gamsu da riƙe ETH a cikin walet ɗin ku ba. Za su iya zama koma baya don ba ku damar samun ƴan kuɗaɗe a kan riƙe ETH tare da ƙoƙarin sa ido.
page-staking-hierarchy-cex-p2: Kasuwancin a nan shi ne cewa masu samar da kayan aiki na tsakiya suna ƙarfafa manyan wuraren saka kuɗi na ETH don gudanar da adadi mai yawa na masu tantancewa. Wannan na iya zama haɗari ga cibiyar sadarwar da masu asusu da ita yayin da take ƙirƙirar babban abu da kuma gazawa, yana sa cibiyar sadarwa ta fuskantanci hari.
page-staking-hierarchy-cex-p3: Idan ba ka jin daɗin riƙe naka yan mukulli, ba laifi. Waɗannan zaɓuɓɓukan suna nan muku. A halin yanzu, ku duba shafin walet ɗinmu, inda za ku fara koyan yadda ake sanin gaskiya mallaka akan kuɗin ku. Lokacin da kuka shirya, ku dawo ku inganta wasan ku ta hanyar gwada ɗaya daga cikin ayyukan tara kuɗin da ake bayarwa na sa kuɗi.
page-staking-hierarchy-subtext: Kamar yadda wataƙila kun ma lura, akwai hanyoyi da yawa don saka kuɗi a Ethereum. Waɗannan hanyoyin sun shirya ga yawan masu asusu da kuma kowanne ya banbanta ta asara, samun kyauta, ko kuma tsammanin aminci. Wasu ma suna da 'yanci gashin kai, gwajin yaƙi da/ko haɗari fiye da wasu. Muna ba da wasu bayanai game da sanannun ayyukan a fadin duniya, amma ko da yaushe kuyi naku binciken kafin tura ETH a ko'ina.
page-staking-comparison-solo-saas: Tare da masu samar da SaaS har yanzu ana buƙatar ku saka ETH 32, amma ba lallai ne ku gudanar da kayan na'urar ba. Kullum kuna ci gaba da samun dama ga mabudin tantancewa, amma kuma kuna buƙatar ku raba mabudin shiga don mai aiki ya yi aiki a madadin mai tantancewar ku. Wannan yana gabatar da kofar yarda da ba ta samuwa a lokacin gudanar da kayan na'urar ku, kuma ba kamar sa kuɗi a gida ba, SaaS baya taimakawa sosai wajen rarraba nodes. Idan hankalinku bai kwanta ba wajen gudanarwa amma har yanzu zaku saka ETH 32, yin amfani da SaaS na iya zama zaɓi mai kyau a gare ku.
page-staking-comparison-solo-pools: Solo staking yana da amfani sosai fiye da saka kuɗi tare da aikin haɗaka, amma yana ba da cikakkiyar damar samun kyautan ETH, da cikakken iko akan saiti da tsaron tantancewar ku. Pooled staking yana da ƙarancin hanyar shiga. Masu amfani za su iya saka kuɗi kaɗan na ETH, ba a buƙatar su samar da mabudi masu inganci, kuma ba su da buƙatun wani abu fiye daidaitaccen intanet mai karfi. Kudin Liquidity suna ba da damar fita daga hannun jari kafin a saka wannan a matakin yarjejeniya. Idan kuna sha'awar waɗannan tsarin, sa kuɗin hadaka na iya dacewa.
page-staking-comparison-saas-solo: Kamanceceniya sun haɗa da samun maɓallanku ingantattu ba tare da tara kuɗi ba, amma tare da SaaS dole ne ku amince da wani ɓangaren mutum na uku, wanda zai iya yin mugunta ko ya zama makasudin kai hari ko tsari da kansu. Idan waɗannan zato na amana ko haɗin kai suna damun ku, ma'auni na zinare na cin gashin kai shine babban abun sakawa na mutum ɗaya.
page-staking-comparison-saas-pools: Waɗannan suna kama da cewa gabaɗaya kun dogara ne ga wani don gudanar da abokin ciniki mai tantancewa, amma ba kamar SaaS ba, sa kuɗi na haɗaka yana ba ku damar shiga tare da ƙaramin adadin ETH. Idan kuna neman hannun jari tare da ƙasa da ETH 32, yi la'akari da duba waɗannan.
page-staking-comparison-pools-saas: Waɗannan suna kama da cewa masu ruwa da tsaki ba sa gudanar da software mai inganci da kansu, amma ba kamar zaɓuɓɓukan haɗawa ba, SaaS yana buƙatar cikakken ajiya na 32 ETH don kunnawa mai inganci. Kyauta yana taruwa ga mai saka kuɗi, kuma yawanci ya ƙunshi kuɗin kowane wata ko wani gungumen ajiya don amfani da sabis ɗin. Idan kun fi son maɓallan ingantaccen ku da kuma kuna neman yin manyan ajiya aƙalla ETH 32, yin amfani da sabis ɗin SaaS na iya zama zaɓi mai kyau a gare ku.
page-staking-considerations-solo-1-descr: Lamba mai muhimmanci shine tushen buɗewa wato 100% kuma yana samuwa ga jama'a don fork da amfani
page-staking-considerations-solo-2-descr: Anyi nazarin lamba mai muhimmaci, kuma an tantance shi an sami sakamakon da kowa zai iya gani
page-staking-considerations-solo-3-descr: An yi kyautar matsalaha na jama'a akan kowace muhimmiyar lamba don ba wa masu amfani kyauta don bayar da rahoto da/ko gyara matsalar da ya faru
page-staking-considerations-solo-3-valid: Na kan aiki a halin yanzu
page-staking-considerations-solo-4-descr: Manhajar tana samuwa kuma jama'a suna amfani da ita na tsawon lokacin da aka nuna
page-staking-considerations-solo-5-descr: Ba'a ba da amincin maɓallan tantancewa ga kowane mutum a kowane lokaci a cikin tsarin rayuwar mai tantancewa ba. Duk wani smart contract da abin ya shafa ba su da ƙofofin baya, ba tare da dogaro da haƙƙin dama don aiwatarwa ba.
page-staking-considerations-solo-6-descr: Masu asusu ba sa buƙatar kowane izini na musamman don sarrafa mai tantancewa ta amfani da manhaja ko aiki
page-staking-considerations-solo-7-descr: Manhajar yana bawa masu asusu damar zaɓa daga kuma canza tsakanin aƙalla abokan ciniki biyu ko fiye da aiwatarwa, da abokan ciniki biyu ko fiye da haɗin guiwa
page-staking-considerations-solo-7-warni: Iyaƙance ga mafi yawancin abokan ciniki
page-staking-considerations-solo-8-descr: Mai asusu yana kula da duk wani ingantaccen takardun shaida, gami da sa hannu da maɓallin cirewa
page-staking-considerations-solo-8-warni: Mai kula da ɓangarori na daban
page-staking-considerations-solo-9-descr: Masu asusu za su iya yin aiki da mai tantancewa ta hanyar tara kasa da ETH 32, ta yin amfani da tara kuɗi daga wasu
page-staking-considerations-saas-4-descr: Manhajar tana samuwa kuma jama'a suna amfani da ita na tsawon lokacin da aka nuna
page-staking-considerations-saas-6-descr: Masu amfani ba sa buƙatar kowane izinin musamman, rajistar asusu ko KYC don shiga tare da sabis
page-staking-considerations-saas-7-descr: Sabis bai kamata ya yi aiki fiye da kashi 50% na jimlar masu tantancewa tare da mafi yawan abokin aikin ba
page-staking-considerations-saas-8-descr: Sabis bai kamata ya gudana fiye da kashi 50% na jimlar masu tantancewa tare da mafi yawan abokin aikin ba
page-staking-considerations-pools-5-desc: Sabis baya buƙatar amincewa da kowane ɗan'adam don kiyaye maɓallan ku ko rarraba kyautuka
page-staking-considerations-pools-6-desc: Sabis na ba kowa damar shiga azaman ma'aikacin node cikin haɗakar, ba tare da izini ba
page-staking-considerations-pools-7-desc: Sabis bai kamata ya yi aiki fiye da kashi 50% na jimlar masu tantancewa tare da mafi yawan abokin aikin ba
page-staking-considerations-pools-8-desc: Na ba da kuɗin kasuwanci don wakiltar ETH ɗinka, wanda aka riƙe a cikin walet ɗinka
page-staking-considerations-pools-9-desc: Sabis bai kamata ya gudana fiye da kashi 50% na jimlar masu tantancewa tare da mafi yawan abokin aikin ba
page-staking-how-solo-works-item-1: Samu wasu kayan aiki: Akwai buƙatar gudanar da node don adana kuɗi
page-staking-how-solo-works-item-2: Daidaita shimfiɗar abokin ciniki mai gabatarwa
page-staking-how-solo-works-item-4: Ƙirƙiri makullan ku kuma ku loda su cikin abokin ciniki mai tantancewa
page-staking-how-solo-works-item-5: Saka ido da kiyaye node ɗinka
page-staking-launchpad-widget-testnet-st: Fara sa kuɗi akan gwajin Holesky
page-staking-launchpad-widget-p1: Ana sa ran masu tabbatar na Kai za su gwada saitin su da kwarewar aiki akan holesky testnet kafin kasada da kuɗi. Ka tuna yana da mahimmanci don zaɓar dan karamin abokin ciniki yayin da yake inganta tsaro na hanyar sadarwa kuma yana iyakance haɗarin ku.
page-staking-launchpad-widget-p2: Idan kun gamsu da shi, za ku iya saita duk abin da ake buƙata daga layin umarni ta amfani da Staking Launchpad kaɗai.
page-staking-launchpad-widget-p3: Don sauƙaƙa abubuwa, duba wasu kayan aikin da jagororin da ke kasa waɗanda za su iya taimaka muku da Staking Launchpad don saita abokin ciniki cikin sauki.
page-staking-stats-box-metric-1-tooltip: Jimlar ETH da aka saka akan Beacon Chain, ba tare da haɗe ragowar ma'auni sama da 32 ETH ba
page-staking-stats-box-metric-2-tooltip: Adadin ingantattun asusun da aka kunna a halin yanzu akan Sarkar Beacon
page-staking-stats-box-metric-3-tooltip: Matsakaicin samun ribar kudi na shekara-shekara ga kowane mai tabbatarwa a cikin sa'o'i 24 da suka gabata
page-staking-section-comparison-subtitle: Babu wani bayani da ya dace da kowa game da saka hannun jari, kuma sun banbamta da juna. A nan za mu kwatanta wasu daga cikin hadarin, lada da kuma bukatun daban-daban hanyoyin da za ka iya saka hannun jari.
page-staking-section-comparison-solo-rew: Matsakaicin lada - karɓar cikakken lada kai tsaye daga ƙa'idar
page-staking-section-comparison-saas-rew: Yawanci ya ƙunshi cikakken kyautan ƙa'idar ragi na kowane wata don ayyukan node
Shafin gudanarwa sau da yawa akwai don sauƙaƙe hanya da abokin cinikin ku mai inganci
page-staking-section-comparison-pools-re: Masu ruwa da tsaki suna tara kyauta daban-daban, dangane da wace hanyar tattara kuɗi aka zaɓi
Yawancin sabis na hada-hadar kuɗi suna ba da ɗaya ko fiye alamomin ruwa wanda ke wakiltar hannun jarin ETH da rabonku na kyautan mai inganci
Ana iya riƙe kuɗin ruwa a cikin walet ɗin ku, ana amfani da su a cikin DeFi kuma ana sayar da su idan kun yanke shawarar fita
page-staking-section-comparison-solo-ris: Akwai hukunce hukunce, wanda farashin ETH, don rashin intanet
page-staking-section-comparison-saas-ris: Haɗura iri ɗaya kamar staking solo da haɗarin masu tanadar da sabis
Ba da amanar amfani da maɓallin sa hannu ga wani wanda zai iya yin rashin gaskiya
page-staking-section-comparison-pools-ri: Haɗura sun bambanta dangane da hanyar da aka yi amfani da su
Gabaɗaya, haɗari sun haɗa da haɗakar ƙungiya, smart contract da haɗarin kisa
page-staking-section-comparison-solo-req: Kula da kayan aikin da ke gudanar da duk ɓangaren Ethereum abokin ciniki mai aiwatarwa da abokin ciniki yarjejeniya yayin da aka haɗa su zuwa intanet
Staking Launchpad zai bi ku ta hanyar tsari da buƙatun na'ura
page-staking-section-comparison-saas-req: Saka ETH 32 don samar da makullin ku tare da taimako
Za'a kula da sauran, kodayake takamaiman ayyukan za su bambanta
page-staking-section-comparison-pools-re: Mafi ƙarancin buƙatu, wasu ayyukan suna buƙatar kaɗan kamar 0.01 ETH
Saka kai tsaye daga walat ɗin ku zuwa dandamali daban-daban na hada-hadar kuɗi ko kuma kawai kasuwanci don ɗaya daga cikin kuɗaɗen ruwa
page-staking-faq-1-answer: Shimai tantancewahaɓaka ne mai kama-da-wane wanda ke rayuwa akan Ethereum kuma yana shiga cikin yarjejeniya ta ka'idar Ethereum. Ana wakilta masu tabbatar da ma'auni, maɓallin jama'a, da sauran kaddarorin. Abokin ciniki na mai tantancewa shine manhajar da ke aiki a madadin mai inganci ta hanyar riƙewa da amfani da maɓallai na sirri. Abokin ingantawa guda ɗaya na iya ɗaukar nau'i-nau'in maɓallai da yawa, yana sarrafa masu inganci da yawa.
page-staking-faq-2-question: Me yasa nake buƙatar samun kuɗi a cikin adana kuɗi?
page-staking-faq-2-answer: Mai tantancewa yana da ikon ba da shawara da kuma tabbatar da toshe hanyoyin sadarwa. Don hana halin rashin gaskiya, masu amfani dole ne su sami kuɗinsu a kan gungumen jingina. Wannan yana ba da damar ƙa'ida don hukunta masu aikata abubuwa marasa kyau. Tsayawa hanya ce ta kiyaye ku da gaskiya, saboda ayyukanku za su sami sakamakon kuɗi.
page-staking-faq-3-answer-p1: Babu wata kuɗin ta 'Eth2' ta asali disa ƙa'ida, kamar yadda alamar ether ta asali (ETH) ba ta canza ba a lokacin da Ethereum ya canza zuwa hujjar-kuɗi.
page-staking-faq-3-answer-p2: Akwai kuɗin da aka samo asali/tickers wadanda zasu iya wakiltar ETH da aka saka (kaman. rETH daga Pool Rocket, stETH daga Lido, ETH2 daga Coinbase). Ƙara koyo game da haɗakar sa kuɗi
page-staking-faq-4-answer-p1: E. Anfara Jingina tun 1 ga watan Disamba, 2020
page-staking-faq-4-answer-p2: Wannan yana nufin cewa a halin yanzu masu asusu suna iya saka ETH din su, don gudanar da client na mai tabbatarwa, su fara samun kyauta.
page-staking-faq-4-answer-p3: An kammala haaka Shanghai/Capella a ranar 12 ga Afrilu, 2023, wanda ya ba da damar cire kuɗi, yana rufe akan kudin ruwa.
page-staking-faq-5-question: Yaushe zan iya cire ETH da na ajje?
page-staking-faq-5-answer-p1: A yanzu haka! masu saka kuɗi suna da 'yanci su janye kyauta da / ko ajiyar farko daga ma'auni na masu tantancewa idan sun zaɓɓa.
page-staking-faq-5-answer-p2: Masu saka kuɗi kuma za su sami lada ta nau'in kudi da MEV lokacin da suke ba da shawarar block, waɗanda aka samar nan da nan ta hanyar adireshin mai karɓar kuɗin da aka saita.
page-staking-faq-5-answer-link: Ƙarin bayani akan cire hannun jari
page-staking-further-reading-5-link: Farshe lamba 33, matakin yarjejeniya na Ethereum (Janairu 2022)
page-staking-further-reading-8-link: Al'ummar Beaconcha.in ta ba da Gudummawar Abubuwan Ilimi
page-staking-further-reading-9-link: Ethereum Staking Launchpad FAQ "tambayoyi da ake yi a kai a kai"
page-staking-toc-how-to-stake-your-eth: Yadda za ka sa ETH ɗinka
page-staking-join-community: Shiga cikin al'umma masu ajiye kuɗi
page-staking-join-community-desc: EthStaker al'umma ce ga kowa da kowa don tattaunawa da koyo game da ajiye kuɗi a kan Ethereum. Kasance tare da dubun dubatar mambobi daga ko'ina cikin duniya don shawara, tallafi, da kuma tattauna duk abubuwan da ke saka kuɗi.
page-staking-meta-description: Bayani na saka kuɗin Ethereum: kasada, kyaututtuka, buƙatu, da inda za a yi shi.
page-staking-withdrawals-important-notic: A halin yanzu ba za a iya cire ETH da aka ajiye ba. Don Allah karanta dan jonin Eth2 da kuma Tambayoyin da aka fiye tambaya bayan jonin domin ƙarin bayani.
subscribe-to-ef-blog: Yi rajista ga EF Blog don karɓar sanarwar imel don sabbin sanarwa na yarjejeniya.
